main event: A civilian couple observed cigar-shaped, greenish-white objects above a drive-in movie in Biloxi, Mississippi over a period of two hours on 12 September 1952.
interesting points: The objects appeared to be the size of the moon and were joined by two similar objects,The objects maneuvered at high speeds making abrupt changes in direction,Several other witnesses were present during the sighting,The objects were visible for approximately 15 minutes before disappearing,No trails, exhaust, or aeronautical features were observed.
